summary.en: Overall sentiment for ETH appears cautiously bearish. Whales are signaling significant selling pressure for LINK, with over $369K moved to exchanges (BEARISH_INFLOW) versus only $56K withdrawn (BULLISH_OUTFLOW). Large neutral USDT movements also indicate active market positioning, but no clear directional bias. 📉🐳
summary.zh: 以太坊整体情绪显示出谨慎看跌。鲸鱼对LINK表现出显著的抛售压力，超过36.9万美元的LINK流入交易所（BEARISH_INFLOW），而仅有5.6万美元流出（BULLISH_OUTFLOW）。大量中性USDT转移也表明市场正在积极调整头寸，但没有明确的方向性偏见。 📉🐳
